text: 5.2 Jon 10.11-13, 21.15-17, Apo 20.28, 1 Ko 9.17, 1 Ti 3.3, 3.8, Tat 1.7, 1.11, Plm 14 God binɨb ne, kɨli chag sipsip tek mɨdebal okok, nɨbop ñek kɨlop kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb ogɨnap nɨbi wog anɨb ak gɨnɨmɨb agɨl, nɨbop nebneb gɨl agel, wog ak ma gɨnɨmɨb. Mani tap okok nen wog anɨb ak ma gɨnɨmɨb. God ne wog ak chɨnop agek, chɨnop tep gɨlɨg gɨnɨgun agɨl, gos tep anɨb ak nɨgɨlɨg wog gɨnɨmɨb.
